title: Looking for A club to take me in and help me get better (im new)
body: Im new to league and am kinda bad and i am looking for a team or club to take me in and teach me things and help me get better i have been playing veigar mid and master yi jungle but i am kinda horrible so please if u have patience and time help me enjoy this game as i really want to  thanks :)

replies.body:
Hey man!
I'm not the greatest at the game, but I'm not horrible either. 
Add me if you want and I'll invite.
I used to main veigar (final boss hehe) and my friend mains jungle so yeah.
Feel free to if you want.
